scripts.docs:redoc: redoc-cli bundle packages/contracts/docs/openapi/bff.openapi.json -o docs/api/bff.html && redoc-cli bundle packages/contracts/docs/openapi/runs.openapi.json -o docs/api/runs.html
scripts.docs:api: pnpm docs:openapi && pnpm docs:redoc && pnpm docs:typedoc
scripts.docs:zip: rm -f site-docs.zip && (cd docs/api && zip -r ../site-docs.zip . || true) && test -f docs/site-docs.zip && echo 'site-docs.zip ready at docs/site-docs.zip'
